title: Moon Transit in the 6th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When the Moon transits the 6th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, emotions are directed toward duties, health routines, and daily problem-solving. Sensitivity increases around work pressure, conflicts, or service responsibilities. Mood fluctuations can impact productivity and well-being, making discipline essential. This phase heightens awareness of physical and emotional health, encouraging adjustments in habits. When managed consciously, it supports emotional resilience, effective service, and the ability to resolve challenges with calm and adaptability.

sections.title: Finance
points: Expenses linked to health or work

closing: This Moon transit emphasizes service, health, and discipline. With balance, it strengthens resilience, efficiency, and calm handling of daily challenges.
